participant_1.name: Sam
participant_1.personality: Introverted and sensitive, often overwhelmed by intense experiences.
participant_1.background: I faint at the sight of blood. My dream in life is to work from home. I have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing role-playing games. I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and social, thrives in relationships and enjoys staying active.
participant_2.background: I'm in an open polyamorous relationship. I have three dogs. I like to watch the Olympics. My father was a door-to-door salesman. I also have a dog walking business.

content.text: good finished my shift and needed to put my feet up for a bit .
Hey, are you here? What's up?
